entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 11:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -17.4°C
Wind: SW 47 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
